content.question: Write an essay that analyzes the rhetorical choices Mandela makes to achieve his purpose of both acknowledging the significance of the election and setting the tone for his administration.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that analyzes the rhetorical choices Mandela makes to achieve his purpose of both acknowledging the significance of the election and setting the tone for his administration.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
